## Overview

This notebook aim to read and explore the dataset from the DIU project.

## Settings things up

```{r}
#| eval: false

library(dplyr)
library(haven)
library(tcltk)
```

## Importing the dataset

```{r}
file <- tcltk::tk_choose.files()
```

```{r}
data <- file |> haven::read_dta()
```


```{r}
data |> dplyr::glimpse()
```
